title: Terrence McNally: On Finding Repair and Relief from the Commodification of Social Design
itunes:title: Terrence McNally: On Finding Repair and Relief from the Commodification of Social Design
description: Terrence McNally, the host of the podcast Free Forum: A World that just Might Work, interviews Rob about the current state of the world and what needs to happen for us to get out of the mess in which we find ourselves.
